name: 亚历山大·奥利弗
name_full: 亚历山大·奥利弗 Alexander Oliver
introduction: Alexander is a Canadian actor from Oakville, Ontario. Upon graduating from Queen's University with a degree in Theatre, he spent a few years traveling and performing sketch comedy in South East Asia. Since his return to Canada, he has been active in the entertainment industry, both on stage and in film. He has spent a couple summers performing with the Thousand Islands Playhouse, and with the Guild Festival Theatre in Toronto.
